title: 351: Drunk at Work + Bekah’s New Home + Psychic Visits
itunes:title: 351: Drunk at Work + Bekah’s New Home + Psychic Visits
description:
(CW: conversations about death) The Broads have recouped and are here to chat about the legendary comedy show they went to, the follow up on their “weird questions to strangers” challenge, Bekah’s bumpy trip, getting drunk at work, updates on Bekah’s home offer and why she’s happy, updates on the haunted house, Jess’ wild visit to a psychic, and much more!

 

THANKS TO OUR SPONSORS:

***THIRD LOVE: get 20% off your first order at THIRDLOVE.COM/CHATTY

***THRIVE MARKET: go to THRIVEMARKET.COM/CHATTY to get 40% off your first order AND a FREE gift! 

***HAWTHORNE: Go to HAWTHORNE.CO and use code CHATTY to get 10% off your first purchase!

***BLUELAND: get 20% off your first order when you go to BLUELAND.COM/CHATTY

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
